page.title: 17Abbotsley Village Hall
page.content: The old school was converted into the Village Hall in 1978.It was donated to the village by a local member of parliament.This year the Village Hall has been redecorated and has a new damp course and has been painted and is now used regulary.The money for the running of the Village Hall is raised mainly during feast week.The Village Hall is used on Monday for the Youth club and on Sundays for Sunday school.It is also used for local meetings and for special occasions; children have Christmas parties, Christmas plays and adults have harvest suppers ,cheese and wine and "Pancake festivities"there.
